issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{{euca-describe-images}} does not show the images and gives following error,

{noformat}
[root@g-12-06 ~]# euca-describe-images --debug
2013-05-02 11:17:50,929 DEBUG   DescribeImages parsed arguments: {'all': False, 'userregion': None, 'filters': None, 'url': None, 'ImageId': [], 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'Owner': None, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'ExecutableBy': None}
2013-05-02 11:17:50,932 INFO    DescribeImages parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeImages', 'Version': '2013-02-01', 'Owner.1': 'self'}
2013-05-02 11:17:50,932 INFO    Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 5)
2013-05-02 11:17:50,934 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.104.1.154:8773\n/services/Eucalyptus\nAWSAccessKeyId=OLGBGE4HQ4MNH2QJJ5C7P&Action=DescribeImages&Owner.1=self&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-05-02T18%3A17%3A50Z&Version=2013-02-01'
2013-05-02 11:17:50,934 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: nwEFwY004jdEHCZdmzuKADAnVcI34MX5p35t1xAS8OY=

2013-05-02 11:17:51,048 INFO    Eucalyptus response status: 200
2013-05-02 11:17:51,048 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: content-length: 110
2013-05-02 11:17:51,048 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2013-05-02 11:17:51,048 DEBUG   DescribeImages -- response content --
<DescribeImagesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2013-02-01/"><imagesSet/></DescribeImagesResponse>
2013-05-02 11:17:51,049 DEBUG   DescribeImages -- end of response content --
euca-describe-images: error: unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'dict' and 'dict'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-describe-images", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.euca.describeimages.DescribeImages.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.1.0_alpha9_3_g7d5f0a3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/command.py", line 288, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.1.0_alpha9_3_g7d5f0a3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/request.py", line 201, in handle_cli_exception
    BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.1.0_alpha9_3_g7d5f0a3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/command.py", line 285, in run
    result = cmd.main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools-3.0.0_alpha6_13_gd70b0fc-py2.6.egg/euca2ools/commands/euca/describeimages.py", line 124, in main
    executable.get('imagesSet', []))
TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'dict' and 'dict'
{noformat}

comments.body: This is a regression in requestbuilder that I fixed yesterday.  Please try this again with the current package set and reopen if the issue persists.
